name.LongName: Clearly and correctly spell first and last name
name.Description: Participant's answer to what their name is

birthday.Description: Participant's answer to what their birthday was

household.LongName: Name of parents and others in household
household.Description: Participant's answer to who is in their household

from.Description: Participant's answer to where they are from

date.LongName: Date: Month, Day of Week, and Day of Month
date.Description: Participant's answer to what day it is

forward_ds.Description: Participant's answer to repeating numbers forwards

backward_ds.Description: Participant's answers to repeating numbers backwards

recall.LongName: Object Naming: Recall Pen, Watch, Glasses
recall.Description: Participant's answers of recalling previous items

body_parts.LongName: Can the child name body parts indicated(hand, foot, knee, nose, ear)
body_parts.Description: Participant's answer of naming body parts

command.LongName: Tell child 'Take piece of paper in right hand, fold in half, and hold to screen'
command.Description: Participant's response of following the command

writing.LongName: Ask the child to write a sentence that makes sense with a subject and verb
writing.Description: Participant's answer of a sentence written

drawing.LongName: Copy the drawing, do it as best you can
drawing.Description: Participant's drawing of a picture of a diamond

dolch_correct.LongName: Indicate the number of correct Second Grade Dolch Words out of 21
